statements: SELECT item_name, sustainability_standard FROM eco_friendly_items;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, certification_status FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name FROM eco_friendly_items ORDER BY sustainability_standard ASC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE sustainability_standard LIKE '%certified%';
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_items ORDER BY item_name DESC, item_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT MAX(item_id) AS max_item_id, MIN(item_id) AS min_item_id FROM eco_friendly_items;
SELECT item_name, sustainability_standard FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE certification_status = FALSE AND sustainability_standard = 'Eco-Friendly';
SELECT item_name, sustainability_standard, certification_status FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT item_name, eco_certification FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check = true;
SELECT id, item_name, eco_certification FROM sustainability_standards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT item_name, compliance_check FROM sustainability_standards WHERE eco_certification = 'Organic';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY date_checked DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check = TRUE;
SELECT id, item_name, eco_certification FROM sustainability_standards WHERE eco_certification LIKE 'organic%';
SELECT item_name, eco_certification, compliance_check FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check = FALSE;
SELECT s.item_name, s.eco_certification, c.outcome FROM sustainability_standards s INNER JOIN compliance_checks c ON s.id = c.check_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards ORDER BY item_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM eco_items;
SELECT item_name, eco_certification FROM eco_items WHERE compliance_check = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, eco_certification, compliance_check FROM eco_items WHERE eco_certification = 'Organic';

SELECT item_name, standard_name, passed FROM eco_items JOIN compliance_checks ON eco_items.item_id = compliance_checks.item_id JOIN sustainability_standards ON compliance_checks.standard_id = sustainability_standards.standard_id WHERE passed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM eco_items WHERE compliance_check = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, eco_certification FROM eco_items WHERE eco_certification = 'Organic';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM sustainability_standards WHERE description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT item_name, compliance_check FROM eco_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT eco_items.item_name, sustainability_standards.standard_name FROM eco_items INNER JOIN compliance_checks ON eco_items.item_id = compliance_checks.item_id INNER JOIN sustainability_standards ON compliance_checks.standard_id = sustainability_standards.standard_id WHERE compliance_checks.passed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, sustainability_rating FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT certification_name, description FROM item_certifications WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, price, sustainability_rating FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE sustainability_rating = 'High';
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check IS NULL ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, certification FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check = TRUE;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date FROM item_certifications WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY issue_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE sustainability_rating LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT item_name, price FROM eco_friendly_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, category FROM items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certifications ORDER BY issuing_organization DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM items WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards
SELECT item_name, certification FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_check = TRUE

SELECT items.item_name, certifications.certification_name FROM items JOIN item_certifications ON items.id = item_certifications.item_id JOIN certifications ON certifications.id = item_certifications.certification_id
SELECT compliance_checks.check_name, compliance_checks.check_description, items.price FROM compliance_checks JOIN items ON compliance_checks.id = items.id
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certifications WHERE validity_period > 2
